argument.name: formname
argument.description: The name of the new form to use.

page.description: Swaps the form displayed in the current window.
page.discussion: The .SWAP() method replaces the current form with a different form. Both forms have to be based on the same table. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim sptr as P sptr = form.load("Customer Information") sptr.show() ? sptr.swap("customerx")
